title: Swain Ult makes him almost unkillable
body: And that's ridiculous. Ever game I get a swain, second he ults my jg and I have to backoff because he's just too damn strong. Anyone who defends his ult is literally just trolling, there's no logical or reasonable defense of why it's not super broken. Also why does his pull go through minions and have such a short cd? he's like a super thresh, completely absurd.

replies.body: ~waiting to see reply saying none of those things makes the ult weak~

Obviously you never played against old swain. His ult was bonkers with healing himself. Not to mention it’s toggle and low CD. I think he’s fine in the state he is. You can counter and out play him. And learn to dodge skill shots.his e isn’t impossible to dodge. And it’s can get caught in minions if you position right.
